parameters.name: DrdsInstanceId
parameters.description: The ID of the PolarDB-X 1.0 instance.

parameters.name: InstanceNames
parameters.description: The names of the ApsaraDB RDS for MySQL instances. Separate the names with commas (,).

parameters.name: Weights
parameters.description: The weights of the ApsaraDB RDS for MySQL instances. Separate the weights with commas (,).
